TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrackingAnnotationCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.List`1<string>
Public Class TrackingAnnotationCollection Inherits List(Of String)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Les annotations sont des `strings` que vous définissez et qui contiennent des informations à associer à certains types de données de suivi. Pour plus d'informations, consultez <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection> est initialisé pour contenir les chaînes spécifiées dans `annotations`.
